name: Blobby Blumzy
description:
Blobby Blumzy is the most boring game of all time !!!

Help CEO Augustine make the world a worse place with her dazzling paperwork powers ! 

Good luck and have fun ! 

You can click on the document to read it.

A little game made for the Trijam #119 Law and Order. 

The goal was to made a game in 3h, here are our respective production time : 

Prud’hom Miguel 3h : character design and animation 

Banti Konrad 3h30 : dev on Unity

Free Assets used :

- Funky Loop by mvrasseli

- backgrounds-for-videogames by pauboeg

- other sound from freesound

- icon/ui from iconfinder
